page.title: 10VANDALISM
page.content:
Clydebank children are having a cinema created especially for them.
The travelling film road show is an idea from the action against vandalism committee of Clydebank District Council.
The first film show will be held in Hardgate Hall on Saturday, June 22. The committee would like to see the films being shown in all the halls in Clydebank.
They are hoping that the films will help to encourage youngsters to take an interest in their environmnt and join in their activities to make Clydebank a pleasant place to live.
